channel.title: CVE Feed for FunnelKit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FunnelKit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1056|2024-08-29T13:52:54.751Z -- funnelkit -- funnelkit%20funnel%20builder%20pro
item.description: The FunnelKit Funnel Builder Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'allow_iframe_tag_in_post' function which uses the 'wp_kses_allowed_html' filter to globally allow script and iframe tags in posts in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-51672|2024-08-02T22:40:34.220Z -- funnelkit -- funnelkit%20checkout
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in FunnelKit FunnelKit Checkout.This issue affects FunnelKit Checkout: from n/a through 3.10.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-2580|2024-08-01T19:18:48.205Z -- funnelkit -- automation%20by%20autonami
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FunnelKit Automation By Autonami allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Automation By Autonami: from n/a through 2.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-38684|2024-07-20T07:42:30.007Z -- funnelkit -- slingblocks%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20by%20funnelkit%20%28formerly%20woofunnels%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FunnelKit SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SlingBlocks – Gutenberg Blocks by FunnelKit (Formerly WooFunnels): from n/a through 1.4.1.
